title: Study of shape-tunable bimodal GdPO4:Eu3+ nanoparticles and their impact on Daphnia magna
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00574K, Paper
Augustas Morkvėnas, Egle Ezerskyte, Vaidas Klimkevičius, Živilė Jurgelėnė, Jonas Venius, Marius Burkanas, Arturas Katelnikovas, Vitalijus Karabanovas
Multimodal nanoprobes offer a promising solution to the sensitivity and specificity limitations in medical assays by combining the benefits of multiple diagnostic modalities into a single particle. GdPO4 doped with...
